duties_responsibilities.duty: Interact with seniors, their family members, and other influencers to explore living options.
Presenting different lifestyles and personalized care services available at the community.
Conduct community tours and host various prospect and professional events to build community occupancy.

education_certification.credential: Five or more years of proven commission-based sales experience.
Proficient in Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint).
Experience working with sales CRM systems and tracking leads and sales activities.
